comment.author: 10040272@N04
comment._content: Looks like fun! Brian Hunter went on to work as editor of The Statesman's Yearbook from 1990-1997. I hope he was able to continue his cigar-smoking and cocktail-drinking there...

comment.author: 48217739@N04
comment._content: Brian was my boss for several years, in charge of the Slavonic collections. He had learnt Russian in the RAF. I recall warm summer days when he would take a draw of catalogue cards out to Lincoln's Inn Fields for checking! CLS

comment.author: 95912590@N00
comment._content: Thanks for uploading a picture of a librarian with such a personality! Just wanted to let you know I used it on my blog here: hiringlibrarians.wordpress.com/2012/03/13/were-hiring-a-p...
